reviewText:
It's pretty good.  We don't get as much explicit action as other Penthouse releases (particularly from 2001 or 2003) but the good news is there are lots of long, lingering shots between the thighs here.  Sometimes the camera, quite unlike the usual overactive Penthouse style, actually just SITS STILL for many moments while the girls fondle each other.  It was very refreshing actually.

Of course the pink shots are more restrained in the sense that they don't get spread open or enthusiastically rubbed or anything, but at least there's plenty of labia to see and very seldomly does the camera get in the way ... my heart actually skipped a beat when I saw one scene where the camera actually FOLLOWED THE GIRL'S HANDS (I know, shocking) up her body, then down to the coochie, then up to the boobs, and back to the coochie... in perfect sync with the girl's seductive motions.

One of the scenes actually looked like genuine girl-girl oral although the camera wasn't quite at the right angle to see point of contact.  And again, seemed like there was a distinct lack of that annoying cut-away editing that usually spoils the good parts of other Penthouse videos.  What there is to see, the camera just shows, with only a few bits of superfluous creativity that distracted me a tiny bit.

I really liked seeing Tanya, the hot redhead toward the end, who also appears in adult films like Zazel.  She definitely made sure you got a good look down below... and she's rather seductive anyway.

Okay. I'm at a loss. There is one other review of this video and all I can figure is that the reviewer was watching this video wearing a pair of Coke bottle glasses. All the women in this video are stunningly beautiful. You get FFN as you'd expect and more than you get in a Playboy DVD. This is softcore to the max and done very well. If you want more than that, then you need to check out XXX videos. I like the women (no guys in the shots) and that's all I want to see. This DVD provides that in some very hot scenes. Definitely a must for the softcore collector!

Penthouse - Sultry Sensations is fifty-eight minutes long and was released on DVD on November 21, 2000. In all honesty the video is not that great. Only two ladies look great and the other ten look like they came from a third rate strip club. Only two of the ladies seem to be having fun and the rest have no idea what to do are look bored. There are three Penthouse Pets in this DVD. Here how the video breaks down.

Jackie-Jackie emerges from a row boat and is wearing a blue dress. After about three minutes, the dress comes eventually comes off and she is nude for the rest of the segment.

Shelly & Leigh-Since I don't know who is who, the segment starts off with a damsel in distress and a bad cowgirl. The two start to get horny; they slowly start to undress each other and the girlie action begins. It is only during the last three minutes are Shelly & Leigh fully nude and are having sex.

Tori & Tiffany-The two ladies start out wearing one and two piece bikinis next to a waterfall. Shortly the two become nude.

Leni & Andrea-The two undress and become nude in front of two hot air balloons.

J.J.-She strips and become nude in a stream.

Angela & J. C.-One is the artist and the other is the nude model. The model quickly undresses the artist and the two quickly fondle each other.

Tonya-Tonya starts of nude in the air parasailing, but the aerial scenes are hard to see her nude. Once on land, the nudity is much better.

Gina- Starts off and stays nude.

Penthouse videos are usually much better, but not this time around. Penthouse - Sultry Sensations gets a D-.

Penthouse Pets

Leigh Anderson-Penthouse Pet of the Month for September 1994 & 25th Anniversary Penthouse Pet
Gina Lamarca-Penthouse Pet of the Month May 1993 & Penthouse Pet of the Year for 1995
Andrea Mountjoy-Penthouse Pet of the Month for April 1994

Bought it for the simple fact that Leigh Anderson was in it.  Should've saved my money.  Very short scene, and it looks so staged and mechanical with the women, that this is nothing more than a DVD in my collection that takes up space.  If you can buy it used for under a dollar, then I guess it might be a deal.  Otherwise, save your money.
